name: festive wheat stitch™ stocking
notes:
❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️

**special offer alert! 
add this pattern to your cart to unlock the exclusive discounted price—don't miss this sale!**

❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️❤️️

there's nothing quite like the charm of a handmade stocking hanging by the fireplace, ready to be filled with holiday cheer.

the **festive wheat stitch™ crochet stocking** pattern brings that magic to your home! this pattern features two versatile sizes, making it perfect for all your holiday decor needs.
 
with its elegant mock-cable texture created using puff stitches and the wheat stitch™ pattern, this stocking is as cozy as it is beautiful. worked in rows for the body and seamlessly joined, finished with a toe and heel worked in the round for a polished look.
 
plus, the included [**video tutorial**][1] ensures you’ll have all the guidance you need to create this timeless piece!
 
crochet hook:
[g+/7 (4.5mm) - or size to meet gauge][2]

notions:
[removable stitch marker][3]
[yarn needle to weave in ends][4]
[scissors][5]
[rivets][6]
[burlap ribbon][7]
[wooden tags][8]

yarn:
[brava worsted][9]
100 % premium acrylic; 218yds/100g

or

[lion brand color theory][10]
100% acrylic, 246yds/100g

yardage:
small (large): 230 (250) yds; 1 (2) balls

yarn substitutions:
[mighty stitch worsted][11]
80% acrylic, 20% superwash wool; 208yds/100g

[mary maxim starlette worsted][12]
100% ultra soft acrylic; 180yds/100g

[brava tweed worsted][13]
97% premium acrylic, 3% viscose; 218yds/100g

[herrschners worsted 8 heathers][14]
100% acrylic, 489yds/226g

abbreviations
blo - back loop only
ch - chain
hdc - half double crochet
hdc2tog - half double crochet 2 together
rs - right side
sc - single crochet
sl st - slip stitch
st(s) - stitch(es)
ws - wrong side

gauge:
15 sts x 13 rows = 4”x4” in stitch pattern repeat, not blocked

not sure what gauge is? check out this blog post: [what is crochet gauge and how to fix it][15]

two sizes:
small (large)

skill level:
advanced beginner
